feed.title: Does anyone have anything at all signed by Satoshi's PGP key?

entry.title: Does anyone have anything at all signed by Satoshi's PGP key?
entry.summary: The conversation starts with a psycho-analytical view on making love to partners as a subconscious desire to make love to oneself. The discussion then moves onto the concept of PGP WoT and its validity. Jeff Garzik argues that verifying an individual's behavioral pattern is more important than meeting them in real life for PGP signatures. He further gives an example of how the online entity known as Satoshi is more relevant than meeting them in person. The conversation ends with a GnuPG v1 signature.
